original_text: From there it went to Beth Hoglah. Then it went north of Beth Arabah to the stone of Bohan. (Bohan was a son of Reuben.)
korean_text: 벧 호글라로 올라가서 벧 아라바 북쪽을 지나 르우벤 자손 보한의 돌에 이르고

sentences.original_text: From there it went to Beth Hoglah.
Then it went north of Beth Arabah
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그것은 벧 아라바 북쪽으로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Bohan was a son of Reuben.
